title: Head
medium: graphite and brush and ink on laid paper
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Leonard Baskin [1922-2000]. Boris Mirski Gallery, Boston, MA, until June 1955; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, June 8, 1955 until April 1967 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1967.

Notes:
[1]. Purchased from the Boris Mirski Gallery on June 8, 1955 for $100 (see Mrs. Beal's notes on a list dated March 1, 1966 in curatorial file.) The drawing was accessioned by the museum on April 11, 1967.

creator.birth_place: New Brunswick (Middlesex county, New Jersey, United States)
